thread.title: James Corden Storms the Grammys With a Star-Studded 'Carpool Karaoke'
thread.title_full: James Corden Storms the Grammys With a Star-Studded 'Carpool Karaoke'

author: johnmichaelbond@me.com (John-Michael Bond)
title: James Corden Storms the Grammys With a Star-Studded 'Carpool Karaoke'
text:
Photo via CBS BTW James Corden 's " Carpool Karaoke " is viral gold, giving pop stars and celebrities a chance to prove they're just as goofy and relatable as the rest of us. During Sunday's Grammys , Corden took the gimmick to the next level by staging its largest karaoke yet with a supergroup singalong of Neil Diamond's "Sweet Caroline." 
Led, of course, by Neil Diamond. Diamond and Cordon were joined by Jennifer Lopez , Tim McGraw, Keith Urban, John Legend , Jason Derulo, Faith Hill, and Ryan Tedder of OneRepublic for the entire song, with a special guest appearance by Blue Ivy Carter at the very end. It's almost as if Corden was trying to upstage Ellen DeGeneres ' legendary Oscar selfie from 2014. 
Ellen wasn't able to land Beyonc√© 's daughter, so obviously Corden won.
